channel.title: Face on Rusland 1

item.title: Face 3x
item.description: About Face and Face Himself An entertaining portrait can be found in a vlog (2017, 11 min) by the eccentric NFKRZ. Face as the Russian Lil Pump. In 2018, the Russian BBC conducted an interview (23 min). Я перестал бояться: I stopped being afraid.
